Linas Kleiza scored a career-high 41 points and grabbed nine rebounds as the Denver Nuggets beat the Utah Jazz 120-109 on Thursday night. in no hurry to make presidential decision Mike Pence Will Not Run for President Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' Bernie Sanders ( technically an Independent, though he generally sides with Democrats) said Ryan's Roadmap would slash Social Security benefits and provide tax breaks for the wealthy, while raising taxes on just about everyone else. The fact of the matter is, Social Security has not contributed one nickel to our deficit or our national debt, and it must be protected, Sen. Bernie Sanders added.
